title: Know the interviewer's name, its spelling, and pronunciation.
description: Use it during the interview. If you don’t know the name, call beforehand and ask the secretary. Also, note the secretary’s name in case you have to call back. Secretaries can influence the hiring decision!

title: Have a reliable pen and a small note pad with you.
description: But do not take notes during the interview. However, immediately afterward, write down as much as you can remember, including your impression of how well you did.
